mapper.select: SELECT csm.`full`, COUNT(*) as num FROM cargo_space_management csm LEFT JOIN warehouse_management wm ON wm.company_id = #{companyId} LEFT JOIN sublibrary_management sm ON sm.warehouse_id = wm.warehouse_id AND sm.del = 0 LEFT JOIN warehouse_area_management wam ON wam.sublibrary_id = sm.sublibrary_id AND wam.del = 0 LEFT JOIN shelf_management shelf ON shelf.warehouse_area_id = wam.warehouse_area_id AND shelf.del = 0 WHERE csm.del = 0 AND csm.shelf_id = shelf.shelf_id GROUP BY csm.`full`

SELECT ii.material_coding , ii.material_name , ii.Inventory_credit , COUNT(ii.id) as count FROM inventory_information ii LEFT JOIN warehouse_management wm ON wm.company_id = #{companyId} LEFT JOIN sublibrary_management sm ON sm.warehouse_id = wm.warehouse_id AND sm.del = 0 LEFT JOIN warehouse_area_management wam ON wam.sublibrary_id = sm.sublibrary_id AND wam.del = 0 LEFT JOIN shelf_management shelf ON shelf.warehouse_area_id = wam.warehouse_area_id AND shelf.del = 0 LEFT JOIN cargo_space_management csm ON csm.shelf_id = shelf.shelf_id AND csm.del = 0 WHERE ii.del = 0 AND ii.cargo_space_id = csm.cargo_space_id GROUP BY ii.material_coding
